metadata.title: CVE-2021-38578 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Existing CommBuffer checks in SmmEntryPoint will not catch underflow whencomputing BufferSize.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38578` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 2022.11-6
ovmf-ia32 - 2022.11-6
qemu-efi - 2022.11-6
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2022.11-6
qemu-efi-arm - 2022.11-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2022.11-6').
